question: Does EVERY guy watch porn?
question_content: I heard that theres not one guy that doesn't watch porn, what do you think?

answers.answer_content:
Most men do, some don't, it depends upon the person, i'm sure and also whether they have the privacy to do so or not.  

I have a male acquaintance / friend who doesn't watch porn so yes there are men out there that dont.  

It's normal for a man to watch porn as the male hormone testosterone is what causes them to seek out visual sexual videos, magazines, etc.   They also have the urge for a sexual release more often than a woman (for the most part).  Nothing wrong with it...

No, I've known a few people that don't like porn at all and never watch it.

Of course, if you count having watched it at least once, then I bet everyone has.
Depends on how satisfied you are with the sexual things around you. I watch porn for that reason.

No, of course not
there's a handful of mommas boys
out there somewhere
and the odd monastery on Mount Sinan
where they don't.

M
